ivardefs.name: category
ivardefs.desc: Indicates where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered.

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: The visit, admission, or other contact between patient and health care provider during which the medication administration was performed.

ivardefs.name: device_
ivardefs.desc: The device used in administering the medication to the patient.  For example, a particular infusion pump.

ivardefs.name: dosage
ivardefs.desc: Describes the medication dosage information details e.g. dose, rate, site, route, etc.

ivardefs.name: eventHistory_
ivardefs.desc: A summary of the events of interest that have occurred, such as when the administration was verified.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifiers associated with this Medication Administration that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. They are business identifiers assigned to this resource by

ivardefs.name: instantiates_
ivardefs.desc: A protocol, guideline, orderset, or other definition that was adhered to in whole or in part by this event.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Extra information about the medication administration that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

ivardefs.name: partOf_
ivardefs.desc: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

ivardefs.name: performer_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates who or what performed the medication administration and how they were involved.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: A code indicating why the medication was given.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered.

ivardefs.name: request
ivardefs.desc: The original request, instruction or authority to perform the administration.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Will generally be set to show that the administration has been completed.  For some long running administrations such as infusions, it is possible for an administration to be started but not completed or it may be paused while some other process is under

ivardefs.name: statusReason_
ivardefs.desc: A code indicating why the administration was not performed.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The person or animal or group receiving the medication.

ivardefs.name: supportingInformation_
ivardefs.desc: Additional information (for example, patient height and weight) that supports the administration of the medication.

properties.desc: Describes the event of a patient consuming or otherwise being administered a medication.  This may be as simple as swallowing a tablet or it may be a long running infusion.  Related resources tie this event to the authorizing prescription, and the specifi
